entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 70%
